snippet: An increase in all-cash purchases of single-family homes and condos in areas like Los Angeles and Boston are squeezing many people out of the market and making it nearly impossible for first-time buyers to even compete.
lead_paragraph: An increase in all-cash purchases of single-family homes and condos in areas like Los Angeles and Boston are squeezing many people out of the market and making it nearly impossible for first-time buyers to even compete.
